The result was empty pockets, a handful of timeless stories and most of the material for his second record, Mercy of the Mountain.

Born and raised in Hebbronville, Texas Pake is a singer/songwriter who grew up listening to and learning to appreciate traditional (good) country music. His first experience playing for the public was in church, accompanying his father (Clark) playing Bluegrass Gospel music.
